 
{{Client function}}
This function can be used to change the playback speed of the specified [[/sound.md|sound]] [[/element.md|element]].

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool setSoundSpeed ( element theSound, float speed )</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP||[[/sound.md|sound]]:setSpeed|speed|getSoundSpeed}}
===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theSound:''' the [[/sound.md|sound]] [[/element.md|element]] which volume you want to modify.
*'''speed:''' a [[/float.md|float]]ing point number representing the desired sound playback speed.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the [[/sound.md|sound]] element playback speed was successfully changed, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function soundFunc()
sound = playSound ( "/sounds/jizzy.mp3",true) -- Let's play a sound
setSoundSpeed ( sound, 1.2 ) -- And it will be a little bit faster !
end
addCommandHandler("play",soundFunc)
</syntaxhighlight>
